day1.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعل آخر كلامنا من الدنيا لا إله إلا الله
day1.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘al aakhira kalaamina minad-dunya laa ilaaha illallah
day1.english: O Allah, make our last words in this world 'There is no god but Allah'.

day1.arabic: رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِي فَرْدًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ الْوَارِثِينَ
day1.transliteration: Rabbi la tadharni fardan wa anta khayrul waaritheen
day1.english: My Lord, do not leave me alone, and You are the best of inheritors. (21:89)

day1.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ حُبَّكَ وَحُبَّ مَن يُحِبُّكَ وَحُبَّ عَمَلٍ يُقَرِّبُنِي إِلَى حُبِّكَ
day1.transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka hubbaka wa hubba man yuhibbuka wa hubba ‘amalin yuqarribuni ila hubbik
day1.english: O Allah, I ask You for Your love, the love of those who love You, and the love of actions that bring me closer to Your love.

day1.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلني ممن تقول لهم النار اعبر فإن نورك أطفأ ناري
day1.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘alni mimman taqoolu lahum an-naar: 'U‘bur fa inna nooraka atfa’a naari'
day1.english: O Allah, make me among those to whom the Fire says: 'Pass through, for your light has extinguished my flames.'

day1.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَلِّغْنَا رَمَضَانَ وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا فِيهِ
day1.transliteration: Allahumma ballighna Ramadana waghfir lana feeh
day1.english: O Allah, allow us to reach Ramadan and forgive us in it.
O Allah, make me firm when questioned (in the grave).

day1.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعل قُبُورَنَا رَوْضَةً مِنْ رِيَاضِ الْجَنَّةِ
day1.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘al quboorana rawdatan min riyaadil-jannah
day1.english: O Allah, make our graves a garden from the gardens of Paradise.
O Allah, conceal our faults and calm our fears.

day1.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلنا مع الذين أَنْعَمْتَ عليهم في الفردوس الأعلى
day1.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘alna ma‘a alladheena an‘amta ‘alayhim fil-firdawsil-a‘laa
day1.english: O Allah, make us among those upon whom You have bestowed Your favor in the highest Paradise.

day1.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِمَنْ أَحْسَنَ إِلَيَّ وَمَنْ أَسَاءَ إِلَيَّ
day1.transliteration: Allahumma ighfir liman ahsana ilayya wa man asaa’a ilayya
day1.english: O Allah, forgive those who have been good to me and those who have wronged me.

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعل القرآن العظيم ربيع قلوبنا، ونور صدورنا، وجلاء أحزاننا، وذهاب همومنا وغمومنا
day2.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘al al-Qur’ana al-‘adheema rabee‘a quloobina, wa noora sudoorina, wa jalaa’a ahzaanina, wa dhahaaba humoomina wa ghumoomina
day2.english: O Allah, make the Noble Qur’an the spring of our hearts, the light of our chests, the remover of our sorrows, and the reliever of our worries and distress.

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ ارزقني قبل الموت توبةً نصوحًا، وعند الموت شهادةً، وبعد الموت جنةً ونعيما
day2.transliteration: Allahumma urzuqni qabla al-mawti tawbatan nasoohan, wa ‘inda al-mawti shahaadatan, wa ba‘da al-mawti jannatan wa na‘eema
day2.english: O Allah, grant me sincere repentance before death, martyrdom at the moment of death, and Paradise and bliss after death.

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلنا من الذين تحبهم، ومن الذين يحبونك، ووفقنا لما تحب وترضى، ولا تحرمنا من النظر إلى وجهك الكريم
day2.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘alna mina alladheena tuhibbuhum, wa mina alladheena yuhibbunak, wa waffiqna lima tuhibbu wa tardha, wa laa tahrimna min an-nadhari ila wajhika al-kareem
day2.english: O Allah, make us among those whom You love and those who love You, guide us to what You love and are pleased with, and do not deprive us from gazing upon Your Noble Face.

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلنا ممن إذا وُضِع في قبره أتاهم من روح الجنة ونعيمها حتى يوم يبعثون
day2.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘alna mimman idha wudi‘a fee qabrihi ataahum min roohi al-jannati wa na‘eemihaa hatta yawma yub‘athoon
day2.english: O Allah, make us among those who, when placed in their graves, are visited by the fragrance and bliss of Paradise until the Day they are resurrected.

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إني أعوذ بك من قلبٍ لا يخشع، ومن عينٍ لا تدمع، ومن دعاءٍ لا يُسمع، ومن نفسٍ لا تشبع
day2.transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘oodhu bika min qalbin laa yakhsha‘, wa min ‘aynin laa tadma‘, wa min du‘aa’in laa yusma‘, wa min nafsin laa tashba‘
day2.english: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from a heart that does not humble, from an eye that does not shed tears, from a supplication that is not heard, and from a soul that is never satisfied.

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلنا ممن تقول لهم الجنة: ادخلوا بسلامٍ آمنين، نِعْمَ أجر العاملين
day2.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘alna mimman taqoolu lahum al-jannah: Udkhuloo bisalaamin aamineen, ni‘ma ajru al-‘aamileen
day2.english: O Allah, make us among those to whom Paradise says: 'Enter in peace, safe and secure; excellent is the reward of the doers of good.'

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجمعني بأحبتي ووالدي وإخواني في الفردوس الأعلى، على سرر متقابلين
day2.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘imni bi-ahibbati wa waalidayya wa ikhwaani fil-firdawsil-a‘laa ‘ala sururin mutaqabileen
day2.english: O Allah, gather me with my loved ones, my parents, and my brothers and sisters in the highest Paradise, on thrones facing each other.

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أبدل خوفي أمنًا، وحزني فرحًا، وضيقي فرجًا، وأملي فيك يقينًا
day2.transliteration: Allahumma abdil khawfi amnan, wa huzni farahan, wa dheeqi farajan, wa amali feeka yaqeenan
day2.english: O Allah, replace my fear with safety, my sadness with joy, my hardship with relief, and my hope in You with certainty.

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اجعلنا من أهل الصلاة الذين هم على صلاتهم دائمون، والذين هم على صلاتهم يحافظون
day2.transliteration: Allahumma aj‘alna min ahl as-salaah alladheena hum ‘ala salaatahim daa’imoon, walladheena hum ‘ala salaatahim yuhaafidhoon
day2.english: O Allah, make us from the people of prayer — those who are constant in their prayers and those who guard them diligently.

day2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إن كانت ذنوبنا عظيمة، فإن عفوك أعظم، فارزقنا عفوك ومغفرتك وجنتك
day2.transliteration: Allahumma in kaanat dhunoobuna ‘adheema, fa inna ‘afwka a‘dham, farzuqna ‘afwka wa maghfirataka wa jannataka
day2.english: O Allah, if our sins are great, then indeed Your pardon is greater; so grant us Your pardon, forgiveness, and Paradise.

day3.english: My Lord, increase me in knowledge — knowledge that brings me closer to You, purifies my heart, and guides my path. (20:114)

day3.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
day3.transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba’da idh hadaytana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmah innaka anta al-Wahhab
day3.english: Our Lord, do not let our hearts sway after You have guided us. Wrap us in a mercy from Your Presence — for You alone are the Bestower. (3:8)

day3.arabic: رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئَاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الْأَبْرَارِ
day3.transliteration: Rabbana faghfir lana dhunoobana wa kaffir ‘anna sayyi’atina wa tawaffana ma’al abraar
day3.english: Our Lord, forgive the weight of our sins, erase our mistakes, and let our final moments be among the righteous. (3:193)
My Lord, open my chest wide with peace, patience, and courage to face all that You decree. (20:25)
O Allah, I ask You for Paradise — for its shade, its rivers, and above all, the joy of seeing You.
O Allah, shield me from the Fire — from its heat, its despair, and its eternal separation from You.

day3.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
day3.transliteration: Rabbi hab li min ladunka dhurriyatan tayyibah
day3.english: My Lord, grant me from Your Presence a pure and blessed offspring who worship You sincerely. (3:38)
Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves — if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will be among the losers. (7:23)

day3.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
day3.transliteration: Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil-aakhirati hasanatan wa qinaa ‘adhaaban-naar
day3.english: Our Lord, grant us the beauty of this life and the beauty of the Hereafter, and protect us from the torment of the Fire. (2:201)

day3.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
day3.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li wa li-walidayya wa lil-mu’mineena yawma yaqoomul hisaab
day3.english: My Lord, forgive me, my parents, and every believer on the Day the Reckoning is established. (14:41)

day4.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
day4.transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba’da idh hadaytana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmah innaka anta al-Wahhab
day4.english: Our Lord, do not let our hearts stray after You have guided us. Pour upon us a mercy from Your Presence — truly, You are the Bestower. (3:8)
My Lord, increase me in knowledge — knowledge that lifts my soul, heals my heart, and draws me closer to You. (20:114)
My Lord, expand my chest with peace, strength, and patience for all that lies ahead. (20:25)

day4.arabic: رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئَاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الْأَبْرَارِ
day4.transliteration: Rabbana faghfir lana dhunoobana wa kaffir ‘anna sayyi’atina wa tawaffana ma’al abraar
day4.english: Our Lord, forgive the weight of our sins, erase our wrongs, and let us depart this life among the righteous. (3:193)
Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves — if You do not forgive us and have mercy, we will surely be among the lost. (7:23)

day4.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
day4.transliteration: Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil-aakhirati hasanatan wa qinaa ‘adhaaban-naar
day4.english: Our Lord, grant us the beauty of this life and the beauty of the Hereafter, and shield us from the torment of the Fire. (2:201)
O Allah, I ask You for Paradise — its peace, its shade, and above all, the joy of seeing You.
O Allah, protect me from the Fire — from its despair, its punishment, and its distance from You.

day4.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
day4.transliteration: Rabbi hab li min ladunka dhurriyatan tayyibah
day4.english: My Lord, grant me from Your Presence a pure and blessed offspring who will worship You sincerely. (3:38)

day4.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
day4.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li wa li-walidayya wa lil-mu’mineena yawma yaqoomul hisaab
day4.english: My Lord, forgive me, my parents, and every believer on the Day the Reckoning is established. (14:41)

day5.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
day5.transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba’da idh hadaytana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmah innaka anta al-Wahhab
day5.english: Our Lord, do not let our hearts turn away after You have guided us. Grant us from Yourself a mercy that never fades. Truly, You are the Giver of all gifts. (3:8)
My Lord, increase me in knowledge — knowledge that enlightens, protects, and draws me nearer to You. (20:114)
My Lord, expand my chest with peace, courage, and clarity for the path ahead. (20:25)
Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves — if You do not forgive and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the lost. (7:23)

day5.arabic: رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئَاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الْأَبْرَارِ
day5.transliteration: Rabbana faghfir lana dhunoobana wa kaffir ‘anna sayyi’atina wa tawaffana ma’al abraar
day5.english: Our Lord, forgive our sins, erase our wrongs, and let us die among those who are righteous and beloved to You. (3:193)

day5.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
day5.transliteration: Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil-aakhirati hasanatan wa qinaa ‘adhaaban-naar
day5.english: Our Lord, grant us the best of this life and the best of the Hereafter, and protect us from the Fire’s torment. (2:201)
O Allah, I ask You for Paradise — its peace, its beauty, and above all, the joy of seeing You.
O Allah, save me from the Fire — from its despair, its punishment, and its distance from Your mercy.

day5.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
day5.transliteration: Rabbi hab li min ladunka dhurriyatan tayyibah
day5.english: My Lord, grant me from Your Presence a pure and righteous offspring who will be a source of light and prayer after me. (3:38)

day5.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
day5.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li wa li-walidayya wa lil-mu’mineena yawma yaqoomul hisaab
day5.english: My Lord, forgive me, my parents, and all believers on the Day the account is established. (14:41)

day6.english: My Lord, expand my chest with peace, courage, and ease for the path You choose for me. (20:25)

day6.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
day6.transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba’da idh hadaytana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmah innaka anta al-Wahhab
day6.english: Our Lord, do not let our hearts turn away after You have guided us, and grant us from Yourself a mercy that never fades. Indeed, You are the Bestower. (3:8)
My Lord, increase me in knowledge that purifies, protects, and draws me closer to You. (20:114)
Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves — if You do not forgive and have mercy on us, we will surely be among the lost. (7:23)

day6.arabic: رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئَاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الْأَبْرَارِ
day6.transliteration: Rabbana faghfir lana dhunoobana wa kaffir ‘anna sayyi’atina wa tawaffana ma’al abraar
day6.english: Our Lord, forgive our sins, erase our wrongs, and let us die among those who are righteous and beloved to You. (3:193)

day6.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
day6.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li wa li-walidayya wa lil-mu’mineena yawma yaqoomul hisaab
day6.english: My Lord, forgive me, my parents, and all believers on the Day the account is established. (14:41)

day6.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
day6.transliteration: Rabbi hab li min ladunka dhurriyatan tayyibah
day6.english: My Lord, grant me from Your presence a pure and righteous offspring who will pray for me after I am gone. (3:38)

day6.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
day6.transliteration: Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil-aakhirati hasanatan wa qinaa ‘adhaaban-naar
day6.english: Our Lord, grant us the best of this life and the best of the Hereafter, and shield us from the torment of the Fire. (2:201)
O Allah, I ask You for Paradise — its peace, its beauty, and above all, the joy of seeing You.
O Allah, save me from the Fire — from its despair, its punishment, and its distance from Your mercy.

day7.english: My Lord, open my heart wide with peace, courage, and the strength to carry what You decree. (20:25)

day7.arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
day7.transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh quloobana ba’da idh hadaytana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmah innaka anta al-Wahhab
day7.english: Our Lord, do not let our hearts slip after You have guided us, and pour upon us from Yourself a mercy that never ends. Truly, You are the Bestower. (3:8)
My Lord, increase me in knowledge that benefits, humbles, and brings me closer to You. (20:114)
Our Lord, we have wronged our own souls — if You do not forgive and have mercy, we will be among the lost. (7:23)

day7.arabic: رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئَاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الْأَبْرَارِ
day7.transliteration: Rabbana faghfir lana dhunoobana wa kaffir ‘anna sayyi’atina wa tawaffana ma’al abraar
day7.english: Our Lord, forgive our sins, erase our wrongs, and let us die among the righteous and beloved to You. (3:193)

day7.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
day7.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li wa li-walidayya wa lil-mu’mineena yawma yaqoomul hisaab
day7.english: My Lord, forgive me, my parents, and all believers on the Day the account is established. (14:41)

day7.arabic: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً
day7.transliteration: Rabbi hab li min ladunka dhurriyatan tayyibah
day7.english: My Lord, bless me with a pure and righteous offspring who will remember me in their prayers after I return to You. (3:38)

day7.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
day7.transliteration: Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil-aakhirati hasanatan wa qinaa ‘adhaaban-naar
day7.english: Our Lord, grant us the best of this life and the best of the Hereafter, and shield us from the torment of the Fire. (2:201)

O Allah, protect me from the Fire — from its despair, its punishment, and its distance from Your mercy.
